meanings.definition: A business organization that makes, buys, or sells goods or services.
meanings.sent1: Many companies in our town produce delicious chocolates.
meanings.sent2: The companies in the city offer a variety of job opportunities.
meanings.sent3: The companies decided to have a friendly competition to see who could sell the most lemonade.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, companies are like puzzle pieces that fit together to create a thriving economy.
meanings.sent5: The companies lined up along the street, each one showcasing its unique products.

meanings.definition: A group of people who go somewhere together.
meanings.sent1: The school companies went on a field trip to the zoo.
meanings.sent2: We saw several companies of tourists exploring the ancient ruins.
meanings.sent3: The companies of friends hiked up the mountain, laughing and chatting along the way.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the companies of campers gathered around the fire to share stories.
meanings.sent5: The companies of athletes cheered each other on during the final stretch of the race.
